text: Her onginneð þæt gewrit þe com of heofonum to Hierusalem, and biforan þam geate þe is gecweden Effrem on eorðan afeoll.
Ðis gewrit soðlice in ðam halgan burh Hierusalem of heofenum dun afeal, and to Sancte Petres sepulchrum becom.
Ðis is þæt ðridde gewrit þæt wæs asend of heofonum, and after ðisson ne cymeð nefre nan oðer.

Ge bisceopes and mæssepreostas cyðað gelomlice ðis gewrit eallum folce, and sendað fram anre burhscire to oðre, and hi biddon and geornlice læron þæt hi gelyfon þæt hit nis afunden fram ænigan eorðlice men, ac gewriten fram handum ðes haligan hælendes.
